mapper.select: select id, owner, repo, full_name, display_name, description, tags, status, priority, openrank, stars, period, period_type, updated_at from repo where owner = #{owner} and repo = #{repo} limit 1
select id, owner, repo, full_name, display_name, description, tags, status, priority, openrank, stars, period, period_type, updated_at from repo where full_name = #{fullName} limit 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO repo (owner, repo, full_name, display_name, description, tags, status, priority, openrank, stars, period, period_type) VALUES (#{owner}, #{repo}, #{fullName}, #{displayName}, #{description}, #{tags}, #{status}, #{priority}, #{openrank}, #{stars}, #{period}, #{periodType}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE display_name = VALUES(display_name), description = VALUES(description), tags = VALUES(tags), status = VALUES(status), priority = VALUES(priority), openrank = VALUES(openrank), stars = VALUES(stars), period = VALUES(period), period_type = VALUES(period_type), updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
